skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome! Alexa wants us to elaborate what we do (as if our name wasn't self-explanatory enough), so here we go! 
Zero Waste Life is the first ever voice-controlled Flash Briefing that brings to you the very best tips, tricks, and advice about how to live a low impact and eco-friendly lifestyle. From small changes you can make daily, to bigger and long term influences that matter- we tell it like it is! 

Essentially, it’s about learning how to send nothing to the landfill and looking great while doing it. Everyday, one-on-one, the best conversation to help erase your carbon footprint. 
 
-Why Zero Waste-

Present cultures of human consumption and waste production is shockingly unsustainable. If we keep going at the rate at which we are, the next 11 years will see the most extreme effects and irreversible effects of climate change. 

Scientists (read: smart people in white lab coats) have emphasised time and again that adopting a zero waste lifestyle is the single most effective way to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and drastically lessen an individual's carbon footprint.

Imagine saving the planet and saving your $$$ at the same time! This lifestyle is highly cost-effective as curbside recycling can reduce more greenhouse gases per Dollar spent. 


Does anyone even read these descriptions? We’re glad if you made it this far. Thank-you :) 

Now, you know the drill. Just say, “Alexa play my Zero Waste Briefing” and let’s save the planet together, one carbon-less footprint at a time!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
